Name: Water Cape
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Piplup, Prinplup, and Empoleon.  You can get a Water Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Piplup Foam, a Piplup Card, and a Sea Ore. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
